alert.note: Alert for Brewster (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:39PM CDT until June 01 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BREWSTER COUNTY... At 539 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Alpine, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. Half dollar size hail was reported in alpine at 530 PM CDT. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Alpine. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
